name: TestimonialCardSixteen
description: Testimonial section with portrait image cards, star ratings, overlay info, and KPI section below.

buttonRules.note: Button variant is controlled by ThemeProvider's defaultButtonVariant.

testimonialRules.note: Each testimonial displays as portrait card with overlay containing rating, name, role, and company

kpiRules.note: Exactly 3 KPI items displayed in a card below testimonials

propsSchema.testimonials: Array<{ id: string, name: string, role: string, company: string, rating: number, imageSrc?: string, videoSrc?: string, imageAlt?: string, videoAriaLabel?: string }>
propsSchema.kpiItems: [KpiItem, KpiItem, KpiItem] (required) - Exactly 3 items with value and label
propsSchema.title: string

usageExample:
<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="icon-arrow" borderRadius="rounded">
  <TestimonialCardSixteen
    title="What Our Clients Say"
    description="Trusted by industry leaders worldwide."
    tag="Testimonials"
    tagIcon={Quote}
    textboxLayout="default"
    animationType="fade"
    useInvertedBackground="none"
    testimonials={[
      {
        id: "1",
        name: "Jane Smith",
        role: "CEO",
        company: "TechCorp",
        rating: 5,
        imageSrc: "/testimonial1.jpg"
      }
    ]}
    kpiItems={[
      { value: "500+", label: "Happy Clients" },
      { value: "98%", label: "Satisfaction Rate" },
      { value: "10+", label: "Years Experience" }
    ]}
  />
</ThemeProvider>
do: Use for testimonial sections with visual emphasis on people
Include exactly 3 KPI items for the bottom section
dont: Do not use without KPI items
Do not use without portrait images
